lead_paragraph: An Illinois law that takes effect Sunday aims to take advantage of the trusted relationship between hairstylists and their clients to prevent domestic violence.
snippet: An Illinois law that takes effect Sunday aims to take advantage of the trusted relationship between hairstylists and their clients to prevent domestic violence....

headline.main: Illinois Law Enlists Hairstylists to Prevent Domestic Abuse
headline.print_headline: Illinois Law Enlists Hairstylists to Prevent Domestic Abuse
